comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: From the look of the "turret" I'd guess that is a PBY Catalina

comment.author: 9681508@N03
comment._content: This is the starboardside (right side) blister gun position on a Consolidated PBY Catalina flying boat, identified by its unique shape, allowing excellent visibility.  Another image in this series shows AOM Waller testing a 30-calibre machine gun he had just installed on the portside (left side) blister of PBY, perhaps the very same aircraft as the one in this image.
